section.title: Social Callback URL
section.para: There is a single callback url used by all realms and social providers. This makes it possible to share the configuration for a social network between multiple realms. An example callback url is http://localhost:8080/auth/rest/social/callback. To get the callback url for your server replace http://localhost:8080 with the base address of your server. You can also find the callback url in the Keycloak Admin Console under social settings.
